meanings.definition: A structure of open latticework, especially one used as a support for climbing plants.
meanings.sent1: The garden had beautiful trellisworks where the vines could grow and climb.
meanings.sent2: She carefully attached the rose plant to the trellisworks to help it grow upwards.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel used the trellisworks as a jungle gym, swinging from vine to vine.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a trellisworks of thoughts, each one intertwining with the next.
meanings.sent5: The trellisworks cast intricate shadows on the ground, creating a mesmerizing pattern.

meanings.definition: The art or practice of constructing trellises.
meanings.sent1: His expertise in trellisworks made him the go-to person for garden structures.
meanings.sent2: Learning about trellisworks involves understanding different types of materials and designs.
meanings.sent3: The competition for the tallest trellisworks in town was fierce among the gardeners.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity in trellisworks was like painting a masterpiece with wood and vines.
meanings.sent5: The trellisworks craftsmanship was so precise that it looked like a work of art in the garden.
